author: John Clarke
title: Dancing Alpacas! Guard Alpacas! Party Alpacas! Breeders Find New Uses After Market Bust
text:
When Ann Patman dances with her recently repurposed alpacas, she must always be prepared for them to scream, spit or orgle.
Ms. Patman runs a farm and dance studio called AlpacaZone outside of Winnipeg, Manitoba, where she offers local residents 45-minute dance classes with her herd of nine.
